mapper.select: select user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_tel, user_email, zipcode, road_address, detailed_address, user_role, coupon_status, user_reg_date, user_status from users where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into users ( user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_tel, user_email, zipcode, road_address, detailed_address, user_role, coupon_status, user_reg_date, user_status ) values ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{zipcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailedAddress}, 'user', 0, sysdate, 1 )
